comment: Awesome professor- patient - I had an online class and she made video tutorials for everyone to watch that explained everything in detail
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Dr. Chang definitely makes the material accessible to her students. She provides useful feedback and works with her students to make sure they understand her coursework.

If the thought of taking a stats or quantitative research makes you a little sick to your stomach, sign up for Dr. Chang.  She makes the material understandable even if you're not a math person.  She is willing to give extra feedback and help if you need it.  She actually TEACHES; she's not just assigning readings and papers.
